title: Art Plan
description: Generated from 02-dictionary/artifacts/art_plan_ENRICHED.md. Specifies an illustration slot so an Illustrator can execute without guessing while keeping player surfaces safe.

tu.description: Reference TU ID in format TU-YYYY-MM-DD-<role><seq>.

edited.description: Date this plan was last edited.

owner.description: Role maintaining the plan; fixed to Art Director.

slice.description: Short player-safe scope label such as "Act I - Foreman Gate (3 sections)".

status.description: Current art status for the slot.

purpose.description: Primary art purpose for this slot.

purpose_rationale.description: 1-2 lines explaining how the image helps the reader here.

subject.description: Concrete nouns describing what the image shows.

focal_affordance.description: What must remain readable at target sizes.

composition_intent.description: Framing, angle, and hierarchy guidance expressed without technique terms.

hierarchy.description: Optional eye movement order or emphasis notes.

spatial_cues.description: Optional description of lines, occlusion, or overlap used to guide reading.

legibility_at_size.description: Target sizes and what must remain readable at thumbnail/print.

iconography_motifs.description: Motifs to include and avoid, aligned with canon and style patterns.

light_palette_texture.description: Descriptive notes on light, palette, and texture without technique jargon.

environment_props.description: Player-safe location tells and props that communicate context.

characters_poses.description: Roles/titles visible and the readable gestures or poses they hold.

inclusion_criteria.description: Conditions for when to include and when to exclude this slot.

alt_text.description: Alt text describing subject, relation, and location in one sentence.

selection_rule.description: Optional rule for when to choose a given variant.

anchor_targets.description: Manuscript paths anchored by this slot.

placement.description: Timing for placement relative to prose or choices.

anchor_stability_risks.description: Optional coordination notes on anchor stability risks.

accessibility.description: Accessibility risks and mitigations for readability.

localization.description: Optional localization notes ensuring captions and terms remain portable.

determinism.description: Off-surface reproduction expectations including any constraints.

repro_expectation.description: Whether additional producer logging is expected.

producer_log_fields.description: Optional list of producer log fields for off-surface technique notes.

handoffs.description: Hand-off notes enumerating who receives which deliverables.

done_checklist.description: Completion checklist confirming readiness before changing status to rendering.

quality_bar.description: One of 8 Quality Bars (see taxonomies.md ยง5)

loop_name.description: One of 13 TU loop types (see taxonomies.md ยง3 and loop_names.md)

deferral_tag.description: Deferral type for dormant roles (see taxonomies.md ยง7)
